text: jab tum log door bhaage chale ja rahe the aur kisee ko mudakar dekhate tak na the aur rasool tumhen pukaar raha tha, jabaki vah tumhaaree doosaree tukadee ke saath tha (jo bhaagee nahin), to allaah ne tumhen shok par shok diya, taaki tumhaare haath se koee cheez nikal jae ya tumapar koee museebat aae to tum shokaakul na ho. aur jo kuchh bhee tum karate ho, allaah usakee bhalee-bhaanti khabar rakhata hai
